title: Interpretation of a dream about a deer: Seeing a deer in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a deer in an unmarried girl’s dream, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a married man or a single young man, whether the young deer is hunting a doe, eating the meat of a dead person slaughtered. A deer hunted by Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of the deer in a dream. The deer in the interpretation of the dream shows good luck, but If you see him running in your dream, the interpretation of this is that you are missing out on life’s opportunities, and seeing it dead in a dream is a sign of inappropriate friendship and misplaced trust, and that killing a deer in a dream is separation from a friendly vinegar or abandonment of a loved one.Interpretation of a deer in a dream for a single womanThe deer In an unmarried woman’s dream, it is her love and affection for those who are far from her, so if she chases him and takes him, she will become a wife to the one she loves. The deer in a girl’s dream is her honor, and it is said that it is good and beautiful. The deer in general symbolizes good luck, meeting a lover, the return of the lover after abandonment, and every beautiful feeling for an unmarried girl. Its blood is money, its flesh is sustenance, work and work, and its horns are a symbol of power and honor. The spirit and skin of the deer are rich, and its eyes in a dream are love and romance, and it is a symbol of virgin love, and it is also said that the symbol of difficult love is unattainable. She did not marry him and married another, because this man remains a dream that he pursues in her dream in the form of a deer. Interpretation of a deer in a dream for a married woman: A deer in a married woman’s dream is good luck, and a dead deer in a married woman’s dream is something missing, and the heart is inhabited by loneliness and emptiness, and the mind is busy searching for Stability. Interpretation of a deer in a dream for a pregnant woman. The deer in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes her pregnancy and her expected child, who is beautiful, as she saw in her dream the beauty of the deer and evidence of joy and the beginning of life. The fleeing woman in her dream is the pain of her condition and fears and a symbol of her anxiety, and the sleeping deer is the calmness of the heart. Interpretation of hunting a deer in a dream Hunting a deer or deer in a dream symbolizes adventure in waking life. This is for a man, as well as for a girl or girl who sees in her dreams that she is chasing or being chased by a deer. This is a sign of the girl's passion to get what she wants. Interpretation of eating venison in a dream. Eating venison in a dream for a man is a rebellion against tradition. It is ambition and success, exclusivity and excessive selfishness. She eats venison, because she gets what she pours into her world. Interpretation of the death of a deer in A dream about a dead deer in dream interpretation is an ended friendship or relationship, and the death of a deer in a dream is evidence of a miserable failure in love, and killing a deer is betrayal by its owner to the point of betrayal and loss. Of trust, and a dead deer in a girl or woman’s dream means parting with a loved one and after it sadness. As for the merchant or businessman, the death of a deer indicates a loss of capital to the point of bankruptcy, and the death of a deer may indicate the failure to satisfy desires. A deer or deer chasing you in a dream. Catching a deer and making it hunt for you in a dream means that you are the owner of great wealth and that the opportunities are available to you in This life has no limits on the professional, family, and even emotional levels, and you are one of the people who may have a great influence in her close or broad environment, such as...

title: What exactly does it mean to see yourself eating sushi in a dream?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing eating sushi in a dream is complete. Sushi is a famous Japanese food that was specially prepared in Japanese cuisine and is one of the ancient official dishes. Sushi also consists of pickled rice covered with slices of raw, skinless fish, red fish meat and seaweed are added to it. It is also believed that having a complete dream about eating sushi is one of the visions that many people may have. Therefore, we present to you, dear followers, all the special meanings and evidence about what is the interpretation of a dream about eating sushi for married women, pregnant women, and also for men, through books of interpretation and visions. The complete interpretation of seeing sushi in a dream. The complete interpretation of eating delicious sushi in a dream indicates that the dreamer needs to change some things in his life. Also, seeing the entire sushi industry in a dream indicates beautiful and useful ideas that will come to the dreamer. Also, dreaming of eating sushi means travel. Traveling and moving from one place to another. To see yourself cooking sushi in a dream means improving relations between the dreamer and certain people. Buying whole sushi in a dream indicates difficult relationships that he wants to get rid of. What is the interpretation of seeing her eating sushi for an ordinary woman? The interpretation of seeing whole sushi being prepared explains For a girl in a dream, the difference in her personality among people. Likewise, seeing a plate of eating sushi in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates kindness and justice in circumstances. Seeing a full woman eating sushi with her lover in a dream means that she will get married and travel to a place far from her family. Seeing a girl eating sushi with her lover in a dream means that she will get married and travel to a place far from her family. Eating whole raw fish in a dream means unsuccessful and inappropriate relationships. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman eating sushi? Seeing a married woman eating sushi in a dream indicates different opinions about some matters in her life. When she sees the same woman sitting in a restaurant eating sushi with her husband, This indicates the end of their problems together. Buying sushi and raw fish in a dream is a dream that indicates good luck and great strength for a woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman eating sushi? When a pregnant woman sees herself eating whole sushi in a dream, this indicates her good relationship with her husband. Also To dream of a pregnant woman eating sushi is a desirable dream and a sign of recovery. Eating sushi in a dream that is full and tastes good means that she will have an easy, affordable and trouble-free birth. What is the interpretation of seeing a man eating sushi? The interpretation of seeing a man eating sushi in a dream shows His cold feelings that must be dealt with properly. Also, seeing completed sushi in a dream for men is a sign of his full participation in his family life and hard work. Also, for a man buying fish during his sleep means a calm and stable life for him, collecting money and achieving his goals. If you had a dream Want to explain it, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about electrical appliances

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about electrical appliances in different cases, electrical appliances are considered one of the necessary things in our lives. Without an electric washing machine, a woman will face many problems in getting clean clothes, and without a refrigerator, food spoils, and without an electric stove, food will not be cooked. It is known that these electrical appliances have helped a lot in saving time and effort to do things, to see electrical appliances in a dream, there are many interpretations and interpretations that we will tell you today in this article on the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a dream about electrical appliances in a dream: There are many different electrical appliances, there is a refrigerator, a washing machine, a stove, a blender, an iron and many other electrical appliances that the dreamer can find in a dream, and here are the interpretations: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gas stove in a dream: Scholars and interpreters interpret seeing the stove in a dream as one of the happy dreams, as the stove in a dream is an indication of the arrival of money and living after effort. If the dreamer finds in his dream that the stove is in a good and decent appearance, this is a sign of goodness and hope that will rise within him. If he sees black smoke coming out of the stove, he will be exposed to bad news. If an unmarried woman finds herself lighting the stove and cooking, her vision is a sign of kindness. From losing hope and his negative energy. As for the married woman who sees the gas stove in good condition, it is good news for her that she will enjoy stability and peace in her married life, and she will enter a new happy stage in her life, God willing, it may be work or childbirth, but the gas that is burning or has defects or does not work does not indicate good and indicates that there are some problems that he will suffer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a washing machine in a dream: Seeing a washing machine in a dream means that God will bless him with an obedient wife who meets the requirements of her home, it may be good news for the wife who gives him an example in sacrifice and giving. That he will make peace with one of his competitors in reality. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is washing clothes in the washing machine, this is an indication of the preparations she will make for her marriage, which will take place soon, God willing. And the married woman who sees the washing machine in her dream is a lot of money that will come into her hands soon, God willing, and if she finds herself washing clothes in a dream, this is good news for her that she will become pregnant soon. When a pregnant woman sees a washing machine in a dream, this is evidence of the approaching date of birth, and her dream is an indication that she will enjoy an easy and simple birth, God willing, and without problems. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a refrigerator in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he opens his refrigerator, this is evidence that he will obtain food and abundant goodness, as if he is a merchant who has earned money and God has enriched him from his courage and white. The refrigerator in a dream is a sign of a righteous and faithful wife and her husband, and an empty refrigerator is a bad omen that shows joy, and the seer is described as ascetic, but does not indicate poverty. Or loss. If an unmarried woman finds a refrigerator full of good things and food, then she

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the indicator stop in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the indicator stop in a dream? One of the most common things that a person dreams about is cutting off his fingers, whether it is a hand or a foot, and this causes fear and extreme anxiety for the dreamer, and a dream about cutting off the index finger in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the index stop in a dream? Whoever sees in his dream that he cut off the index finger in the dream, this is evidence of a problem. Great for the dreamer and you will face difficulties in your life, but you will overcome these problems and God and God will solve them. God knows. Better. What is the interpretation of seeing your fingers cut off in a dream? Whoever sees in a dream that he is cutting off his finger, this is evidence that a problem will arise for his son, but it will be solved, God willing. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is cutting off his fingers and has no son, this is evidence that the prayer he is praying is invalid. Whoever sees in his dream that he cut off his fingers, then this is the hand of Ali, and the dreamer will face many problems and lose his money, and God knows best. And whoever dreams of cutting off the fingers of his hand, this is evidence of abandoning forbidden things. What is the interpretation of a dream that we cut off the little finger in a dream? Whoever sees in a dream that he cut off his little finger This indicates that the dreamer will miss him and will travel. What is the interpretation of a dream about cutting off the middle finger in a dream?: Whoever sees in his dream that he is cutting off his middle finger, this indicates the death of the owner of the country, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of cutting off four fingers from one hand in a dream? He saw in his dream that he cut off four fingers from one hand, so this is evidence that the dreamer will marry five women, and God will take them all, and God knows best. Cutting the fingers of the right hand is evidence of prayer. Cutting the fingers of the left hand is evidence of the children of a sister or brother. The best interpretation of seeing the fingers Cut off in a dream: There is some interpretation of cutting off fingers or toes in a dream, which indicates sustenance with plenty of money and the provision of a child, which is an adornment of life and increases happiness and stability, as God Almighty said. God knows best. The bad interpretation of cutting the fingers of the hand in a dream: It is said that when one of the fingers of the hand is cut, this is undesirable and indicates the occurrence of problems and severe distress. Or evidence of the emergence of distress and problem for the son of insight. Or a warning and a sign from God to the dreamer after prayer, or regularity of prayer. And every knowledge is in God, and God knows best. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of the meaning of a ring in a dream: Seeing a ring in a dream

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of a ring in a dream for a girl, for a single woman, for a married woman, a gold ring for a pregnant woman, wearing a silver ring, iron wood, buying a ring, selling the ring. Interpretation of a ring in a dream. The ring indicates what he has and what he is capable of, so whoever was given the ring, bought it, or gave it to her He has power or wealth if he is from his people. If it is made of gold, then there is no good in it, and the same applies if it is made of iron because it is an ornament of the people of Hell, or copper. Because of the word “jinx” in his name, and what “jinx” causes. Made of. The ring also indicates a father and wife, buying a maid, a house, an animal, money, or a country. If it is gold, it is for the man. Whoever dreams that he is wearing an iron ring, this bodes well that he will win after being tired. If it is gold and has a clove, it is very dangerous. Solid, hollow rings are never good, and stuffing that contains a filling indicates murder and deceit, because something hidden in it portends hope for something great and many benefits, because its bone is greater than its weight. As for horn or ivory rings, they are worthy of praise among women. The ring is a great sultan, the ring is the origin of kingship, and the ring is its prestige and The ring is the expiration of the authority and the state’s money, and the seal is his command and prohibition, and the inscription on it is his intention and intention. Whoever sees that the king is imprinted with his seal, then the sultan quickly takes his authority and does not violate him; Because a seal is stronger than a seal. Whoever dreams that he wears a silver ring and places it in the place he wants and is allowed to do so, then he will be afflicted with power. Whoever sees that it is sealed with the seal of the Caliph and he is from Bani Hashim or from the Arabs, then he will command a great matter. If he is a believer or has a father who dies. His father is in the heir. If he does not have a father, his affairs will conflict with what he wants. If someone sees it from the outside, he will have an invalid matter. Whoever finds a ring has received money from a non-Arab, or has a son, or gets married. Whoever sees that the ring’s lobe is faltering, his authority will supervise the separation. If someone wears a ring, something attributed to his ring will be renewed. Whoever sees the ring broken and leaves and the capsule remains, then his strength will leave and his name, memory and beauty will remain. And the golden ring. New, hateful to the religion, treacherous to his possession, and unjust to his flock. And the ring is made of iron, a brave sultan or a skillful merchant, but inactive in memory. The ring is made of lead, in it is the weakness of the ruler, and the ring with lobes is external and internal strength. The tightness of the ring suggests ease and comfort. And whoever borrows the ring has something that will not last. Whoever gets an engraved ring has something that he never had, such as a house, an animal, a maid, or a child. If he sees the rings being sold in the market, then he is selling the property of the chiefs of the people. If he sees the sky raining rings, then children will be born that year. The ring of the Arabs is a woman, and the golden ring is said: She is a woman whose money is gone. He who put a ring on his finger and then took it off and put it on another, then led his wife and called for corruption. If he saw that his ring was on his finger once on his finger and once on his waist without it being around it, then His wife is cheating on him. Whoever sells his ring for a dirham, flour, or sesame and leaves...

title: Interpretation of dreams according to Imam Al-Sadiq, the letter Ain

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by Imam al-Sadiq, the letter Ayn. It is known that the letter Ayn is included in many words that have multiple meanings, and in this article we will present several words that begin with the letter Ayn and their interpretation according to Imam al-Sadiq. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of the letter Ayn in a dream according to Imam al-Sadiq. Interpretation of dreams by Imam al-Sadiq, the letter Ayn. If The dreamer saw “pubic hair” in his dream. Its interpretation varies depending on whether the dreamer is a woman or a man. If it is a woman, this leads to her separation from her husband. As for shaving the pubic hair and cleaning it in the dream, this indicates removing tension and paying debts to the dreamer. Seeing a threshold in a dream means for a woman, It was also said that she is the wife. Lentils in a dream indicate a lawful livelihood derived from the work of God. The Day of Arafat in a dream indicates the return of the traveler, and it is also said that it is goodness, sustenance, and blessing. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Whoever slaughters a bird in his dream, This indicates the weakness of the son or illness, and this happens to the pioneer. Seeing a bird in a dream is a symbol of fun, play and amusement, and they are also said to be beautiful women. Watching solitude in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Watching solitude in a dream leads to loss of money, loss of work or job, or it can be translated It also leads to deprivation of the blessing of having children for the dreamer. Seeing a separation in a dream is a symbol that indicates separation between spouses, divorce, or the death of one or both of them. Penguin in a dream Seeing the oud in a dream Seeing the oud in a dream portends the death of the dreamer and that he will give birth to a son. It can also lead to To the marriage of the dreamer if he is not married. It is also said that the illness has disappeared if the dreamer is sick. Seeing thirst in a dream Seeing thirst in a dream leads to anxiety and distress for the dreamer, and it is also said that the illness will subside if the dreamer is sick. Seeing thirst In a dream: Seeing thirst in a dream leads to distress and distress for the dreamer. It is also said that there are many debts and distress in life and situation. Seeing thirst in a dream indicates wrong behavior for the dreamer. It is also said that the dreamer is not dedicated to the duties of religion. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation Following the Aqeeqah in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that whoever sees an Aqeeqah in a dream means the disappearance of worry and suffering, the disease will go away, and he will be healed by it. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that the Aqeeqah in a dream indicates the strength of a person’s faith in his Lord and the return of the absent and the traveler. Interpretation of seeing a spring of water in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Any person dreams. With a spring of water, it is a symbol of good solutions and a lot of money. It is also said that it is God’s veil over the dreamer and a good life. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. What is the interpretation of the letter “Ain” in a dream? The letter Ain in a dream has many and multiple meanings, and its interpretation varies according to the mood of the owner. The dream. Seeing the letter “Ayn” in a dream has a different interpretation depending on what is clear in the dream and whether it indicates happiness and joy or not. Interpretation of seeing honey in a dream for a single woman: Seeing honey in a dream is evidence of happiness and happiness.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a car for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a car for a married woman: A car in a dream is one of the things that occupies the mind of a married woman in order to come up with the correct interpretations about it, which may be promising or that there is another nutritional element behind this dream that you must be aware of. The following lines will put all the clues related to seeing a car in A dream for a married woman so that she is reassured and not worried, read with us to find out all the news. Interpretation of a dream about a car for a married woman. If you see a car in a dream for a married woman, this indicates the good news that she will learn in the coming days and that will change her life for the better. The car in a woman’s dream symbolizes abundant goodness. Which she will obtain in the afterlife as a result of her patience with the adversities and crises that she went through in the previous period. Seeing the dreamer driving a car in a dream shows her ability to deal with difficult situations and overcome them with great skill, and the car in the woman’s dream means that she and her husband will learn about her pregnancy in the coming days. They will be full of happiness and joy as a result of their waiting for this event for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about a car for a married woman Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a car in a dream for a married woman portends a decent life that she will live with her partner and children, and her attempt to raise them according to Sharia and religion in order to apply it in their lives and be just. Society, but if he is sleeping, driving a car recklessly in a dream symbolizes the adversity and difficulties that she will face due to her negligence and shortcomings in married life. Seeing an old car in a woman’s eyes indicates that she will be in a bad financial situation in the near future due to her husband’s inability to bear responsibility and his leaving his job. Because of the inability. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A website about dream interpretation secrets. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a car for a pregnant woman. Seeing a car in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes her imminent birth, and she and her child will be healthy. Good. Seeing a wrecked car in a woman’s sight indicates that she is going through a crisis that could affect the life of her fetus, so she must be careful and follow the doctor’s instructions so as not to regret it when it is too late. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a married woman: Seeing a married woman driving a black car in a dream symbolizes To the strength of her character and her ability to deal with crises without loss, and driving a car in a dream for a woman leads to the end of the experiences and obstacles that hindered her life. . The previous period, and they will live in peace and comfort. Seeing a car in a woman’s dream means that she will get a big promotion at work as a result of her efficiency in doing what is required of her in a short period of time, and driving a white car in a woman’s dream indicates her medical reputation among the people and her support for the needy and the poor. Driving a car in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman driving a luxury car in a dream symbolizes the end of the crises and experiences that hindered her life in previous years because of his hatred for him.

title: The meaning of buying fish in a dream and its most important connotations according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The meaning of buying fish in a dream and its most important implications according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, and not many people around the world know that dreams and dreams, in other words, are among the things that make our lives. Although such things do not happen in reality, this shows us and guides us to many different things in the sense that a dream or a dream has many consequences that happen after we see it and fall into a deep sleep. I do not know what is happening, in the real outside world anything, even the smallest and smallest things. Buying fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations or analyzes by many interpretation experts and scholars, but today we will take a look at the most important interpretations related to one of the greatest and most important interpreters who witnessed The history of their existence is as follows: We mention in the first interpretation, if a man sees that he bought a big and beautiful fish in a dream, then there is no doubt that he can marry a girl or woman of good character and good character. We also know that not everyone who saw a fish in a dream saw a fish, so Anyone who saw a lot of fish or at least one fish bought it, but the fish was unbearable because of its corrosion or its serious, unbearable smell. From his stench, and God Almighty, I know that he is the one committing immorality, and he has strayed from the path that God wants for us. If someone sees that he has bought a small fish, this may mean that the viewer feels some confusion or that his affairs will end for the worse in general. In a dream or vision in which the fortuneteller sees that he has caught a large fish, this indicates, in one way or another, that the fortuneteller is taking money that he does not deserve, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. If the fortuneteller sees that he has caught a fish and that person washes and cleans the fish, this is a good sign, God willing. God, which is that this person will achieve some goals in his life that he has always sought. If a person sees a dream in which he buys an abnormal fish, that is, a fish that is still as it came out of the sea, then the dreamer, if he is single and not yet married, indicates that he will get married soon. And God Almighty. The highest and most knowledgeable, and this indicates that he will have good offspring, and God Almighty knows best. If the dreamer sees a dream in which he sees that he is buying fish for decorative purposes, this indicates that God Almighty is the Most High and Most Knowledgeable, and that he will benefit financially from one of the relatives. See also: Interpretation of the dream By hearing the Qur’an in a dream for an unmarried and divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream in which you see grilled fish. We also know for certain that this life is not without difficulties, and in this context we are talking about the different interpretations of seeing fish in a dream and in a dream. This dream, one way or another, has many problems and also many worries that are enough for many people if distributed among them. We will summarize these topics in the form of points as follows: If the dreamer sees grilled fish and this does not indicate that it is a good fish, then this is one of the bad things that will undoubtedly affect the dreamer. But if one sees a well-cooked fish in a dream, this is undoubtedly one of the things that indicate

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an exam in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Seeing an exam or test in a dream is a common and recurring vision for many people, so today we will present to you the interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream if it appears in the dream of a man or a woman, because the vision differs in its interpretation depending on the social and psychological state that the dreamer himself is going through, as we will explain to you. Interpretation of dreams about a belt in a dream... a close connection and the birth of a boy. Interpretation of seeing exams in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl who is currently studying sees that she is taking an exam in a dream, then this vision is considered a normal and recurring vision in such cases as a result of this girl’s great thinking about this matter. An examination in a dream of an unmarried girl could be a suggestion for a young man to propose marriage to this girl in the near future. This girl may be confused between accepting or rejecting this groom. Imam Al-Sadiq says that the test in the girl’s dream could be a test from God Almighty and the extent of her steadfastness in not committing prohibitions and sins in her life. Ibn Sirin says that the test in the dream of an unmarried girl may indicate Until there is something in that girl’s life that she is thinking about a lot at that moment. Interpretation of seeing a dream about a throat in a dream: giving birth to a girl and memorizing the Holy Qur’an. Interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream for a married woman. If the dreamer has children of school age, she often dreams That she is under surveillance as a result of her preoccupation with the academic level of her children and their entry into the test. Some dream interpreters believe that the examination that appears in a married woman’s dream may be the result of this woman’s denial of the reality in which she lives at the present time and her longing again for the past. The test may be in the woman’s dream For a married woman, this woman is facing a big problem in her current life, and this vision may be an expression of the woman’s confusion to escape this problem. Cheating on an exam is one of the signs that the dreamer is committing a wrong act in her life. Interpretation of a dream about sweets in a dream... with money and repentance. Interpretation of a vision Examination in a man’s dreamIf the examination appears in a man’s dream, this may indicate that this man will be appointed to a new job in the coming period. Cheating on a man’s exam is one of the signs that this man has committed many forbidden acts in his life and needs to re-examine himself. Ibn Sirin says that examining a man in a dream indicates that there are some decisions that require thought and consideration for this man. Al-Nabulsi believes that examining a man in a dream indicates that this man will be exposed to difficult situations in which the extent of that man’s patience and wisdom to get out of those situations will be measured. Interpretation Dreaming of milk in a dream.. Halal money and close marriage. Interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream for a young man: A young man who sees an exam in a dream indicates that he will enter into a romantic relationship in the coming days. But if the young man is already studying at this time, then passing the exam foretells him that he will get Excellent grades on the exam, and his inability to pass the exam yesh

Al-Nabulsi believes that examining a man in a dream indicates that this man will be exposed to difficult situations in which the extent of that man’s patience and wisdom to get out of those situations will be measured. Interpretation Dreaming of milk in a dream.. Halal money and close marriage. Interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream for a young man: A young man who sees an exam in a dream indicates that he will enter into a romantic relationship in the coming days. But if the young man is already studying at this time, then passing the exam foretells him that he will get Excellent grades on the exam, and his inability to pass the exam yesh
